body.name: Instant Vortex 2QT Mini Air Fryer, Small Air fryer that Crisps, Reheats, Bakes, Roasts for Quick Easy Meals, Includes over 100 In-App Recipes, is Dishwasher-Safe, from the Makers of Instant Pot, Black

FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 10 mins
features: 4-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Air fry, bake, roast and reheat.
EvenCrisp TECHNOLOGY: Advanced technology that drives air flow top down for a perfect golden finish and crispy, tender results every time!
ONE-TOUCH SMART PROGRAMS: Customizable programs for one-touch wings, roasted veggies, garlicky potatoes, cookies, cinnamon buns and more!
FAST PREHEATING: Little to no preheating time, from frozen to golden in minutes! Create gourmet meals with the versatility of a temperature range of 120 to 400° F.
EASY CLEAN-UP: Non-stick, dishwasher safe air fry basket and tray.
A KITCHEN MUST HAVE: Perfect for quick delicious meals, preparing side dishes, appetizers, wings and more. Great addition to any kitchen; perfect for 1-2 servings
DISCOVER AMAZING RECIPES: Includes the free Instant Brands Connect App, where you can find new recipes to create quick favorites and prepare delicious meals, available iOS and Android.
SAFETY FEATURES: Built-in safety features like Overheat Protection, auto-off and more to keep your mind at ease.
COMPACT DESIGN with a POP of color: Perfectly combines function and style in a countertop-friendly size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little Kitchen Jewel
reviews.reviewText: At first I was disappointed in the color, it seemed so pale. A few days later I was very happy that the happy cheerful pale mint green little appliance was that color. I really like the color This is a small air fryer, takes up a small counter area. It is not loud when running. The little buttons on the front of the air fryer are easy to see and use. We use the air fryer to air fry, bake and reheat foods. It is so easy to use, and to clean which is one reason we love it so much.This is not our first Air Fryer. It is the smallest, easiest to use and clean. Takes up very little counter space, works as it should. Does a great job cooking in a nice little pan which has a good sized contoured handle on it that is easy to hold and use to pull the pan from the machine and to put it back into the pan. We wish we had found this little jewel sooner. Yes, buy one for yourself, it is good quality product and reasonable price. And very pretty on kitchen counter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little air fryer! It’s a staple for me but just started traveling for work and couldn’t bring my giant air fryer around the country with me so I found this one that’s smaller and lighter. It’s nice and clean looking, doesn’t take up much space, super simple to use, and really easy to clean. I have zero regrets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Powerhouse for Delicious Meals!
reviews.reviewText: The Mini Air Fryer has completely revolutionized my cooking experience. This compact powerhouse deserves a glowing five-star rating for its exceptional performance and versatility.First and foremost, the cooking results achieved with this appliance are truly outstanding. The air frying capabilities are top-notch, allowing me to achieve perfectly crispy and golden-brown foods with minimal oil. Whether it's fries, chicken wings, or even homemade crispy tofu, this mini air fryer oven consistently delivers mouthwatering results. The 4-in-1 functionality is a major plus. Alongside air frying, it also functions as a versatile oven, allowing me to bake, roast, and reheat a wide range of dishes. The oven mode distributes heat evenly, ensuring consistent and thorough cooking. It has become my go-to appliance for quickly preparing delicious meals without compromising on taste or quality.Despite its compact size, the capacity is surprisingly generous. It easily accommodates small to medium-sized portions, making it perfect for individuals or small households. The cooking basket is well-designed, allowing for efficient airflow and even cooking. The non-stick coating makes cleaning a breeze, saving me precious time in the kitchen. The intuitive control panel and user-friendly interface make operating the Instant Pot Vortex a breeze. With its pre-set cooking functions, I can simply select the desired option and let the appliance do the rest. It takes the guesswork out of cooking and ensures consistent and reliable results every time.Another aspect worth mentioning is the speed and efficiency of this appliance. It heats up quickly and cooks food faster than traditional ovens, saving both time and energy. The convenience of having a compact air fryer oven combo means I can whip up a delicious meal in no time, even on busy days.Lastly, the build quality of the Instant Pot Vortex is exceptional. It feels sturdy and well-constructed, assuring me of its durability. The sleek and modern design adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen countertop, making it a stylish addition to any culinary space.In conclusion, this little air fryer has exceeded my expectations in every way. It consistently delivers delicious and crispy results, offers versatile cooking options, and is incredibly user-friendly. If you're looking for a compact yet powerful appliance to enhance your cooking experience, I highly recommend the Instant Pot Vortex. It's a true kitchen gem that will revolutionize the way you prepare meals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first air fryer. I live alone and have a small kitchen, wanted something I could put away in a cabinet when not in use, and this fits the bill.The fan noise is not a big deal (and when it's cold I love holding my hands next to the exhaust vent for the warm air), it had a plasticky smell the first 2-3 times I used it (I did wash the basket before use), but now it smells fine. Cleaning is a breeze - I spray the basket with water vigorously right after cooking and that's usually enough. Some things, like roasting drippy tomatillos, burned the juice to the bottom. A quick soak and then a wipe with a sponge and it was clean again.So far everything I've cooked I've just done at 400 (the air fry temperature), but it's easy to change the temperature and the time. I like the "food turn" beeps around 2/3 of the way through the time as well as when it's preheated and when it's done.The basket is too short to roast a whole red bell pepper (even after removing the tray from the basket), but cutting the pepper in half and putting foil under it worked great. I've also roasted thinner chiles whole (hatch, anaheim, jalapeno, pasilla), and it doesn't set off my fire alarm the way my broiler does, while still cooking the whole chiles enough that the skin blackened and came right off.Other successes: roasting nuts, baking pie crust cookies, falafel, broccoli (had to learn to put the stems in way early and only put the florets in at the end because they'll burn), roasting garlic or onions or tomatillos, crisping up tofu, sweet potato fries, butternut squash.So far I haven't used any recipes for time and temperature - I've done everything at 400 and put it on for 20 minutes and just keep checking it for doneness until I figure out what works. I think I'm going to try caramelizing bananas next.This thing is fun! I can't make enough sweet potato fries as I want in a single batch, but I can make as many as I should probably eat in one sitting. It's plenty big enough to make as much broccoli as I want, go figure.
